upgrades.name: Oxygen Mask
upgrades.warning: The pilot ignores the effects of high altitude and negates up to 2 G-Penalty.

safety.name: Flare Slot
safety.warning: Allows flares to be fired out of a closed cockpit without opening the cockpit.

gunsights.name: Telescopic Gunsight
gunsights.warning: +2 to attack if you Drew a Bead

gunsights.name: Gyro Gunsight
gunsights.warning: +2 to attack if you Drew a Bead

radiator-type.name: Evaporation
radiator-type.warning: Attacks with a Crit rolls of 16+ will knock out the radiator, in addition to normal effects.

radiator-mount.name: High
radiator-mount.warning: Bonus persists for 1 Cool Down after being shot. If the plane is an open cockpit, will spray the pilot with the radiator fluid!

radiator-mount.name: High Offset
radiator-mount.warning: Bonus persists for 1 Cool Down after being shot.

radiator-coolant.name: Castor Oil
radiator-coolant.warning: Absorbs 1 Miss to Cool Down. +2 Stress if leaking.

radiator-coolant.name: Ammonia
radiator-coolant.warning: Caps RPM to 3. Causes 2 Injury when leaking.

propellers.MVP_Warning: Allows blad pitch to be adjusted on the ground without replacing it.

frames.name: Living Grove
frames.warning: Free Repairs for Living Grove sections.

hstab.name: T-Tail
hstab.warning: In the event of a spin/stall while above stall speed and under power, you are at a Disadvantage to recover.

ailerons.name: Wing Warping
ailerons.warning: Get +1 to Dogfight! at 15 speed and below.

ailerons.name: Spoilerons
ailerons.warning: When you Dogfight!, spend double speed but take +1

flaps.name: Lift Dumpers
flaps.warning: Activate for +1 to Dogfight!, then immediately induce a stall.

drag_inducers.name: Air Brake
drag_inducers.warning: When deployed, immediately bleed of speed equal to Speed Factor and gain +1 to Dogfight!.

drag_inducers.name: Dive Brake
drag_inducers.warning: When deployed, steep dives trade altitude for speed at 1-2 instead of 1-3.

drag_inducers.name: Drogue Chute
drag_inducers.warning: Can be activated as a weapon or a one-use Air-Brake.

safety.name: Remote Fire Extinguisher
safety.warning: Spend to put out a fire.

extras.name: Zeppelin Hook
extras.warning: Allows landing inside airships or large planes.

information.name: Reconnaissance Camera
information.warning: Can take pictures downward. Capabilities scale with era.

autopilots.name: Altitude Holding
autopilots.warning: Allows the Empty Seat rule to be ignored.

autopilots.name: Programmable
autopilots.warning: Can do anything but Dogfight!, fire weapons, drop bombs, or make landings.
